query:
SELECT 
            i.id, 
            i.uuid, 
            i.name, 
            i.url,
            CASE WHEN EXISTS (
                SELECT c.id FROM connection c
                INNER JOIN location l ON l.id = c.location_id
                WHERE l.instance_id = i.id AND c.end IS NULL
            ) THEN true ELSE false END AS "connected: _"
            FROM instance i
